title: A Study of settings in Herman Melville's typee
abstract: Herman Me lville is one of the america 's qceates imaginative authors . Typee is his first novel. It is about a man's adventure who has jumped ship and then live among the cannibals . This novel made Herman Melville famous when it was published . This thesis will analyze the setting in Typee . Because of his experience in Typee valley , Nelville can describe the landscape of the valley so naturally that he can produce a vivid picture of the natives surrounding by the beautiful and exotic island . Finally , the writer wants to analyze how Melville 's settinq related to other elements of fiction .
subjects: AMERICAN FICTION-19TH CENTURY; MELVILLE, HERMAN.1819-1891. TYPEE
